attributes.action: Cancel the laws that allow councils to take property to pay for care/nursing homes.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Cuurently the law allows councils to take property and income from people who need to move to a care or nursing home. These laws do not take into account that there may be live in carers living in the house, these carers have to leave their home when they have put a lot of effort into caring for the home owner.
